- [93mPolarity[0m [93mGradient[0m [92mEngineering[0m of [93mDual[0m-[93mPore[0m [93mCovalent[0m [93mOrganic[0m [93mFrameworks[0m [93mSynchronize[0m [93mMass[0m [93mTransport[0m and [93mReaction[0m for [93mMicropollutant[0m [93mRemoval[0m.: An [93mintrinsic[0m [93mmismatch[0m between [93mmolecular[0m [93mtransport[0m and [93minterfacial[0m [93mreaction[0m within [93mporous[0m [93mmaterials[0m [93mgreatly[0m [93mlimits[0m the [93mcatalytic[0m [93mperformance[0m for [93mwater[0m [93mtreatment[0m. [93mHere[0m, [93mwe[0m [93mreport[0m [93mdual[0m-[93mpore[0m [93mcovalent[0m [93morganic[0m [93mframeworks[0m ([93mCOFs[0m) [93mfeaturing[0m [93malternating[0m [93mtriangular[0m [93mmicropores[0m and [93mhexagonal[0m [93mmesopores[0m to [93moptimize[0m this [93mtrade[0m-off. - [93mMitigation[0m [93mPotential[0m of [93mbio[0m-[93mfabricated[0m [93mselenium[0m [93mnanoparticles[0m on [93marsenic[0m [93minduced[0m [93mstress[0m in [93mmorpho[0m-[93mphysiological[0m [93mgrowth[0m of [93mrice[0m ([93mOryza[0m [93msativa[0m [93mL[0m.) [93mseedlings[0m.: [93mArsenic[0m (As) is a [93mhighly[0m [93mtoxic[0m [93mmetalloid[0m that [93mpresents[0m a [93mmajor[0m [93menvironmental[0m [93mhazard[0m. [93mExtensive[0m [93mcontamination[0m of [93magricultural[0m [93msoils[0m by As is a [93mglobal[0m [93mconcern[0m, [93mnecessitating[0m the [93mdevelopment[0m of [93meffective[0m and [93mcost[0m-[93mefficient[0m [93mstrategies[0m to [93mmitigate[0m its [93mimpact[0m on [93mfood[0m [93msafety[0m. [93mAlthough[0m [93mselenium[0m ([93mSe[0m) [93mhas[0m been [93mrecognized[0m for its [93mantagonistic[0m [93minteractions[0m with As, the [93mpotential[0m of [93mselenium[0m [93mnanoparticles[0m ([93mSeNPs[0m) in [93mmitigating[0m As [93mtoxicity[0m [93mremains[0m [93munderexplored[0m.
